name: Bakarina Adventures: Spin-off
description:
Visual Novel with interactive elements.

Find your way to survive.

Pick choices that matter.

You already played this game in your previous life. And your fate is doomed. Or maybe you can play your cards differently and save yourself?

Either way - try to outlive your fate, or at least be ready to be exiled.

-------------------------------------

Each episode - is a chance to get better. Get better at new skills such as swordsmanship or throwing snakes to overcome your enemies. Or - get better at a relationship with them.
